field.label: Enable Store Switcher
field.comment: If enabled, show custom store switcher. Doesn't display anything if disabled.

field.label: Trim Specific Store Code In Url
field.comment: Used to retrieve and trim store code in url in order to give the correct request path to magento. E.g. site.com/de to site.com/

field.label: Replace Specific Store Name For Store Switcher
field.comment: Used in storeswitcher block to display custom name instead of store name. E.g. if your value in the field is 'French' and the store name is 'FR' it will display French instead of FR in the switcher
